oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War veteran Samuel Wallace Duncan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Samuel Wallace Duncan, Co. M, 7th Penn. Vol. Cav. Regt., USA, taken at a veterans' reunion. Duncan was from Johnstown, Penn. He enlisted in February 1864, and participated in the battles and skirmishes of the Atlanta Campaign. He remained in Chattanooga; after the war and died in 1915. He is buried at Forest Hills Cemetery. In this image he wears a Grand Army of the Republic badge on his coat and has the insignia on his hat.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Duncan, Samuel Wallace
